This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

![](blog_post_1.webp)
Miller placed second in the 400-meters at the Nazareth Conference Challenge Cup on Saturday with an impressive time of 48.89 seconds. He was part of the 4 x 400-meter relay team that placed fourth in a time of 3:20.48 (split of 48.23), which is currently seventh best in Division III this season. His time of 48.89 in the 400-meters is currently eighth best in Division III to date this season.
